She runs a sari-sari (variety) store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks of groceries to sell. She has been in this business for 6 years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, noodles, and school supplies. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy more stocks of groceries to sell

loans.name: Erna

texts.en:
Erna is 49 years old, married and has 2 children. She is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She has been raising pigs for 28 years now, and has borrowed 24 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs. In the future, Erna would like to save enough to provide financial stability for her family.

loans.use: To buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Jerlyn

texts.en:
Jerlyn is 43 years old and married with 5 children. She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. She has been farming rice for 10 years and also earns additional income from her sari-sari (variety) store.

She is borrowing PHP 27,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies. Jerlyn is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream - to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Agapita

texts.en:
Agapita is a 52-year-old married woman with two adult-aged children. Agapita is from Baranggay 5, Tangub City. To make a living, she owns and operates a general store, selling a variety of different products like milk, soap, shampoo and so on in the local community. Agapita has been 15 years in her business and she earns about 3,000 PHP a month. 

In 2009, Agapita joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. She is requesting a loan of 20,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional inventory and have working capital. This will be her sixth loan taken out from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional inventory and have working capital.

loans.name: Celline

texts.en:
Celline is 38 years old, married and blessed with four children.  She does tailoring to earn a living.  She has been in the business since 1999.  

She expresses gratitude to Faulu Kenya, because she has managed to grow her business.  This is because she has boosted her business with her previous loans from Faulu Kenya.  She also has managed to employ one person to assist her in the business.  

Celline hopes to open other outlets in the future.  She needs 50,000 Kenya shillings to buy fabric.

loans.use: to buy fabric

loans.name: Josefa

texts.en:
Josefa is 43 years old and married with 4 children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs an Avon dealership business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks of Avon products to sell.

She has borrowed and paid back 8 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the dealership for 13 years and also earns an income from food vending. Josefa aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy more stocks of Avon products to sell.

loans.name: Simon

texts.en:
Simon is 67 years old, married to Jane, and they have four school-going children. He does masonry work which has been in operation for the last 24 years, with a monthly income of about KES 30,000.  

He has a good history with KADET LTD, and he is applying for his seventh loan of KES 50,000 after repaying the previous loans successfully. He hopes to use the amount to purchase iron sheets for renovating his rental houses.

The anticipated profits he will save and pay school fees for his children. In future he hopes to grow his business, purchase a plot and build more rental houses.

loans.use: To purchase iron sheets for renovation.

loans.name: Mansur

texts.ru: Мансур трудолюбивый, перспективный молодой человек. Он женат и у них один ребенок. Он занимается выращиванием скота. Он получены доход тратит на содержание семьи. Кроме своей семьи он еще имеет на иждивении свою мать. Это указывает на его доброту и человечность. Он старается в достатке содержать семью несмотря на свою молодость. Пасти скот ему удобно, так как пастбище находится недалеко от дома. Ему нужен займ  для  приобретения нескольких голов скота и корма для них. Он очень надеется на поддержку добрых людей и благодарен им заранее. Спасибо.
texts.en: Mansur is a hardworking and promising young man.  He is married and has one child.  Mansur is involved in raising livestock.  He spends his earned profit to support his family.  Besides his own family, he also supports his mother, and this speaks of his kindness and humanity.  Despite his youth, he tries to provide everything necessary for his family.  It is convenient for Mansur to take his livestock to pasture because it is located close to his home.  He needs a loan to buy several heads of livestock and fodder for them.  Mansur relies on the help of kind people and thanks them in advance.  Thank you.

loans.use: to purchase livestock and fodder

loans.name: Lina

texts.en:
Lina works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 5 years now.

She requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food vending business. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy ingredients for her food vending business.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is 66 years old and married. She works very hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock to sell in her sari-sari store.

She has been in this business for 11 years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap, canned goods, noodles, etc. In the future Lucia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy additional stock to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Laura

texts.en: Laura is a 44-year-old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She is engaged in fishing. Her husband, who is a fisherman, operates their fishing boat. Laura sells his catch at the market. According to Laura, they earn about 5,000 PHP per month doing this fishing business. She works hard to support her husband in providing for their needs. She said that it is her goal to feed her family 3 times a day. Laura has requested a loan to purchase fishing nets, crab traps and other materials. She hopes this loan will help improve their business.

loans.use: to purchase fishing nets, crab traps and other materials.

loans.name: Mary Bethanie

texts.en:
Mary Bethanie is married with 3 children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 41 years old and has 3 children who are in school.

She has a tailoring business in the Philippines and has been in this business for 20 years. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase cloth and other materials for her tailoring business.

In the future, Mary Bethanie would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To purchase cloth and other materials for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Pedra

texts.en: Pedra is 38 years old and lives in Guba, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 2 school-aged children. She has a Public Utility Vehicle business and earns approximately PHP 5,000 each month doing this type of work.  She has a requested a loan of PHP 45,000 to purchase equipment for her transportation business. She has been a member of PMPC for 2 years.  Pedra hopes to expand her business in coming years.

loans.use: to purchase equipment for her transportation business.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret is 30 years old, married and blessed with two children.  To earn a living, she owns a stall where she sells mainly shoes and cosmetics.  She has been in the business for one year and employs one person.  She also owns rental houses which earn her extra income.  Previously, she operated a salon.

Margaret wants to grow her business in five years and sell other products.  She needs 20,000 Kenya shillings to buy shoes and cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy shoes and cosmetics

loans.name: Henry

texts.en:
Henry is 27 years old and a single man. He has operated a motorcycle transport business for the last three years, and the business is doing well.  

He has a good history with KADET LTD, and he is applying for his third loan after repaying the previous loans successfully. He hopes to use the loan amount to purchase a new motorbike and employ a driver.

He will save the anticipated profits, pay back his loan and grow his business further. Henry hopes to become a successful businessman in Mombasa and to open a taxi business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase a new motorbike and employ a driver.

loans.name: Duyen

texts.en:
Duyen is 45 years old. She lives in Pho Cho Town, Yen Phong, Bac Ninh. She has a store where she sells products made from iron, such as iron nails and screwdrivers. She has had this job for 10 years. She has a monthly income of about 8,000 Vietnamdong (VND). 

She has participated in SEDA since 2007 and always repaid loans punctually. This is the 6th time she has borrowed money from SEDA. This time she would like to borrow 9,632,000 VND to repair her store to have more space to store iron products.

loans.use: to repair her store to have more space to store iron products.

loans.name: Medelina

texts.en:
Medelina is 47 years old and married with 4 children. She works very hard to provide for them. She runs a sari-sari (variety) store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

She has been in this business for 6 years and sells a variety of items such as soft drinks, canned goods, noodles, spices, sugar, etc. In the future she would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: To purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita is a married woman and has eight children. She is 60 years old and resides at Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur, Philippines. 

She owns and operates a farm, planting & harvesting rice to sell to earn a living, and she's been 10 years in this business. Each month, she earns about 10,000 PHP doing this type of business. 

She requested a loan of 20,000 PHP to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. She has been a member of GDMPC for almost a year. In the future, Rosita wants to make improvements to her house and to finish the studies of her children.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.en: Nelly works hard to support her family. She is married and has a ready-to-wear business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 25 years now. She requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell. In the future, Nelly would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Maisha Zakhem Group

texts.en:
Salma is in her early 30s and married with three children, two of whom go to school.  She has been selling cosmetics for two years now.  She works from 8 am to 8 pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit. 

This will be her 5th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loan to buy missing items in her grocery stock and has paid back all her loans successfully.  She wants a loan to buy more cosmetics to sell. Her dream is to one day be able to have a big cosmetics shop.

She will share this loan with her loan group "Maisha Zakhem" which has a total of 24 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back their loans.

loans.use: to buy more cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Habibullo

texts.ru: Хабибулло проживает в районе Яван. Ему 75 лет. Он зарабатывает путем разведения крупнорогатого скота. Этим видом деятельности занимается 30 лет. У Хабибулло пятеро детей. Он женат. Двое его дочери работают в дехканском хозяйстве. Он берет кредит для закупа бычка и теленка.
texts.en: Habibullo lives in the Yavan region. He's seventy-five years old and makes a living by breeding large cattle. He's been in this field of work for thirty years. He has five children and a wife. Two of his daughters work on dekhan farms. Habibullo is asking for a loan in order to purchase a bull and a calf.

loans.use: to purchase a bull and a calf.

loans.name: Esterlita

texts.en:
Esterlita is 47 years old and is married with three children. She lives in Liloan, Bonifacio, Misamis Occidental. For the past two years, she has been selling fertilized duck eggs. Esterlita has been a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative for almost two months.

Esterlita is requesting a 4,000 PHP loan to purchase fertilized duck eggs to sell. In the future, she hopes to improve her standard of living and earn a lot through her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilized duck eggs to sell

loans.name: Virgilio

texts.en:
Virgilio is 51 years old and is married with one child. He lives in Candanay Sur, Siquijor, Siquijor. Virgilio runs an electronics shop and earns 14,000 PHP doing this work. He has been a member of the Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative for seven months.

Virgilio is requesting a 13,000 PHP loan to purchase assorted accessories for his shop. In the future, he hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to purchase electronic accessories to sell

loans.name: Bella

texts.en:
Bella is a responsible mother and devoted to help her husband to earn a living. She is now 53 and has only one son. 

She and her husband have owned and managed a welding shop in their community for almost 10 years and usually earn a profit of P10,000 a month that they usually spend on their daily consumption needs, allowance for their son and to save for future emergencies. Sometimes, they have encountered problems in managing the business, but they consider it a challenge for them to overcome. 

They have competitors in the area, but because of their good customer service they draw new customers. They plan to improve their welding shop and provide a better service but, due to inadequate capital, Bella is asking for an additional P40,000 to buy a welding rod, angle bar, round bar and flat bar needed in their welding shop. 

This loan will help them to improve their business and satisfy their customers' needs.

loans.use: to buy a welding rod, angle bar, round bar and flat bar needed in their welding shop

loans.name: Estela

texts.en:
Estela is 30 years old and is widowed with four children. She is from Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. To make a living, Estela operates a business selling seafood products, such as fish and shrimp, in the local community. Estela has been in her business for over six years and earns approximately 4,000 PHP a month. 

In 2008, Estela joined GDMPC in 2008 to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Estela is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase fish to raise and buy a fishing boat. She plans to use the additional revenue generated with her loan to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fish to raise and a fishing boat

location.town: Santo Nino, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Virgilio

texts.en:
Virgilio is 63 years old and is married with four children. He is a fisherman from Talibon, Bohol. Virgilio has been engaged in fishing for quite some time now and is able to provide for his family's needs through fishing. He works hard to feed his family three times a day and keep them healthy.

Virgilio is requesting a loan to purchase fishing nets, crab traps, and rice. He hopes to expand his business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase fishing nets, crab traps, and rice

loans.name: Eustiquia Group

texts.en:
Eustiquia is 62 years old and lives in Cogon, Ozamiz City. She is a widow with five children. For the past 11 years, Eustiquia has been a farmer and she grows corn to earn a living. She is the group leader of this two-person group. Although they borrow as a group, each member has her own business. Eustiquia has been a member of PMPC for two years.

Eustiquia has requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer. She hopes to increase her corn production.

loans.use: to purchase corn fertilizer

loans.name: Samad

texts.ru: Самад женат имеет  двоих детей. Он любящий семьянин. У него свой бизнес. В столь трудные времена финансового кризиса содержать семью в достатке нелегко. В своем магазине он продает продукты питания и хозяйственные товары. Более 4 лет он занимается данным бизнесом и успешен в своем деле. Его продуктовый магазин находится возле его дома. На полученный доход он хочет обеспечить детям хорошее образование. Для этого они вместе с женой много работают. Жена работает врачом в местной больнице. Он хочет расширить свой бизнес, приобретя еще новый ассортимент продуктов. Для этого он хочет получить займ и надеется в вашей поддержке. Спасибо за ваше понимание и доброту. Он заранее благодарен вам.
texts.en: Samad is married and has two children.  He is a loving family man.  Samad has his own business.  It is difficult to provide enough for the family during such difficult times of the financial crisis.  Samad sells food products and household goods in his store.  He has been involved in this business for over four years and is successful at it.  His food store is located near his house.  Samad wants to use the received profit to provide his children with a good education.  This is why his wife and he work a lot.  His wife works as a doctor at a local hospital.  Samad wants to expand his business by buying a new selection of products.  This is why he wants to obtain this loan and hopes that you would support him.  Thank you for your understanding and kindness.  Samad is grateful to you in advance.

loans.use: to purchase food products

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn believes that opportunity is available for everyone; all you have to do is to grab it. Jocelyn's goal in life is to give a progressive way of living to her family. Jocelyn is 34 years old and married with four school-age children.

Jocelyn runs a rice farming business, planting rice on their farm within their village. Jocelyn has been in this business for 10 years. She has 1.5 hectares of rice fields, from which she usually earns a net income of P40,000 per crop.

Jocelyn’s income from her last crop was invested in another business for an additional source of income for the family. Some went for the allowances of her children and household use. Jocelyn needs additional working capital to continue her farming business. 

Jocelyn wishes to borrow P40,000 to purchase rice seed, fertilizers, insecticides and herbicides for rice farming. She hopes to receive the loan and maintain her business.

loans.use: to purchase rice seed, fertilizers, insecticides and herbicides for rice farming

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
At her young age of 27, Myrna was widowed. She has one child who she sends to get an elementary education. Her late husband managed a hectare of rice field but in his absence, Myrna has to manage it in order to generate an income and provide for the needs of her child. She pays for laborers who help her in the farm. They do the planting up to harvesting season. 

Myrna is now 30 years old and in need for an additional capital of P30,000. She will use this loan to buy rice seeds, fertilizers and insecticides to use in farming. 

Myrna hopes to produce more cavans of rice compared to her last harvest of only 50 cavans. She also hopes to see her child finish a degree someday.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds, fertilizers and insecticides to use in farming.

loans.name: Ngoan

texts.en: Ngoan, 48 years old, lives in Cho town, Yen Phong, Bac Ninh.  She has two children who are married.  For 10 years, Ngan has been running a restaurant with the help of her husband.  They sell breakfast and have a monthly income of about 5.000.000 Vietnam dong. Since 2007 she has participated in SEDA. The last time, she borrowed 8.288.000 VND and repaid this loan punctually. This time, she would like to borrow 9.632.000 VND, to invest in her restaurant, by buying more chairs and tables.

loans.use: to invest in her restaurant - buy more chairs and tables.

loans.name: Monica

texts.en:
Monica is a 43-year-old married lady with four children. She is hardworking and for 12 years she has been in the clothing business. However, Monica faces a challenge of seasonality of the business since in some seasons the sales are very poor. 

Her personal goal is to educate her children and build a house in the near future. She hopes to expand her business and move it to a permanent location since she is currently a market vendor. She intends to use the loan to buy more clothes for sale to take advantage of the peak Christmas season.

loans.use: To buy clothes for selling.
